definitions.definition: the small, soft, white pieces of ice that sometimes fall from the sky when it is cold, or the white layer on the ground and other surfaces that it forms:
examples: Outside the snow began to fall.
We haven't had many heavy snows this winter.

definitions.definition: If it snows, snow falls from the sky:
to be unable to travel away from a place because of very heavy snow:
examples: We were snowed in for four days last winter.
